page.title: 13A Day In The Life.
page.content: My name is Christy Cooke and I am 10 years old.I live near Chelsfield with my Mum,Dad and my sister Tracy.I am writing about a normal day in my life. I would normally get up at 7.20a.m. get dressed and have breakfast.At 8.35 I wait at the top of our drive ready to be picked up by my neighbour to go to school.Before school starts I play with my friend for a little while. The bell for the start of lessons goes at 8.55 and we all go into class.At 10.10 we go in to assembly and then at 10.30 we have a break.After this lessons start again until lunch time.I have packed lunches but you can have meals prepared by the school.Lessons continue again until 3.30 when it is home time. As soon as I get home I make a cup of tea for my Dad.Sometimes I go to ballet but usually we have tea then watch T.V.
